posts.post_title: OJs - Mastro etc. for Sale etc.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian H (misunderestimated)
I won lot #1263 (4 OJs) and will be selling All but the O'Rourke i.e. 
Ed Mckean/Cleveland (PSA EX-MT 6), Billy O'Brien/Washington (PSA VG-EX 4), and Rip Van Haltren (PSA EX 5). 
Also, I have an Hank O'Day PSA 4 (HOF nominee as an umpire) and my current O'Rourke (a PSA 1, that looks nicer).  I will have scans of these 2 available.
I haven't yet formulated prices and would welcome offers in the meantime.
PLEASE email me if interested (earlier emails get priority)

bhodes@rcn.com

Orator Jim O'Rourke is SOLD

Hank O'Day -- a lousy Pitcher who went on to a very long and distinguished career as an umpire (he called Fred Merkle out as I recall) and is now a HOF nominee as an umpire --  PSA 4 is $360

George "Van Halen" Van Haltren PSA 5 is on SOLD/Reserved

McKean PSA 6 is $675
